Text: "Invincible" is a song recorded by Canadian pop rock group Hedley for their fourth studio album, "Storms" (2011).

<Text: Invincible (Hedley song):  The song was released to radio on August 22, 2011 and to digital retailers on August 23, 2011 through Universal Music Canada as the lead single from "Storms".>
